text:
Esther Van Ginderen-Verbeeck, also known as Aunt Terry (8 September 1931 – 30 January 2018) was a Flemish television presenter and businesswoman. She was born in Hoboken, Antwerp. From 1989, when she founded VTM she worked for this channel, again for children's programs.
Van Ginderen died of pneumonia on 30 January 2018 in Bonheiden, Antwerp at the age of 86.
